item.title: Scanning the web host and the law
item.dc:creator: c0wm1lk
item.description:
As far as I know, it’s perfectly legal but it will attract some unwanted attention.
As to doing it anonymously, use a VPS I suppose, one that protects your identity. You can scan 24/7 with it.

I would also recommend you check out the following DEFCON presentation:

DEFCON 16: Nmap: Scanning the Internet
